Kia ora {{ preferred_name }},
Thanks for completing the steps to join Z Electric! We’re looking forward to connecting with you at {{ property_address }}.
What’s next?
We’re reviewing your details so that we can set you up for electricity, so sit tight and we’ll be in touch if we have any questions. We’ll contact your old power provider and tell them that you want to join Z Electric.
It can sometimes take up to 10 business days, but don’t worry, your electricity won’t be disconnected!

Fuel Rewards with Sharetank
If you haven’t already, download Z App and open Sharetank. Once joined, your Fuel Rewards will be deposited 14 days later, directly into your Sharetank. Then you can start redeeming, or rewarding the ones you love!
Plus, you’ll continue to earn 5L of fuel for every $100 spent on your Z Electric power bill – you’ll score these as soon as you pay your bill, sweet!
Already a Sharetank user?
We hope you are loving Sharetank as much as we do! Here’s how to ensure it’ll work smoothly for you:
1. Ensure you’ve used the same mobile phone number for Z Electric and Z App – they’re connected in our systems.
2. Fuel Rewards are deposited into the Sharetank that you are active in – so, if you’re sharing tanks, double check you are in the right one!

Your payment method
Here’s a summary of the [payment type] information you've given us.
Your direct debit instructions were received on {{ direct_debit_created_at }}, and have been set up for your {{ direct_debit_bank }} account: {{ direct_debit_account_number }} with the account name: {{ direct_debit_account_name }}.
You can read our direct debit terms and conditions online.

Need help?
If you’ve got any questions, we’ve got you sorted in our online Help Centre - just head to z.co.nz/electrichelp or reply back to this email with your question, and one of the team will check it out for you.
Ngā mihi nui,
The team @ Z Electric
